author: Adi Robertson
title: Facebook is banning protest events that violate social distancing rules
description: Facebook says that it’s removing events for anti-coronavirus quarantine protests if they encourage participants to flout states’ COVID-19 social distancing rules.
content:
Events that defy governments guidance on social distancing arent allowed on Facebook
Photo by JEFF KOWALSKY/AFP via Getty Images
Facebook is banning promotions for protests that violate social distancing rules, the company has confirmed. CNN reporter Donie … [+2947 chars]
